arts.ttl: Mainz and Stuttgart to appeal red cards in Bundesliga defeats
arts.sum: Both VfB Stuttgart and FSV Mainz 05 are contemplating appeals of refereeing decisions following their losses this weekend.

arts.ttl: "It was a demanding game" - Angelo Stiller after Stuttgart's defeat to Bremen
arts.sum: The 24-year-old spoke to the media after the game.

arts.ttl: Sebastian Hoeneß: "Today is a tough, bitter day"
arts.sum: Sebastian Hoeneß gave his take on the game this afternoon at the MHP Arena.

arts.ttl: Oliver Burke brace breaks 10-man Stuttgart hearts as Werder Bremen snatch late victory
arts.sum: Werder Bremen secured a dramatic 2-1 away win against the 10 men of VfB Stuttgart on a day when Oliver Burke netted twice, with his second coming in the 90th minute. Oliver Burke fires home the equaliser for Werder Bremen in the 32nd minute.
Werder Bremen ground out a late 2-1 victory at the MHP Arena this afternoon.

arts.ttl: Sunday's Bundesliga predictions including Stuttgart vs. Werder Bremen
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including Stuttgart vs. Werder Bremen.

arts.ttl: Vagnoman and Stuttgart far apart in extension talks
arts.sum: Josha Vagnoman could leave VfB Stuttgart this summer after no progress in contract discussions.

arts.ttl: VfB Stuttgart head coach Sebastian Hoeneß addresses Deniz Undav’s dip in form
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart trainer Sebastian Hoeneß spoke on Deniz Undav's form dip at his Friday pre-match press conference.
